metadata.title: CVE-2018-3849 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In the ffghtb function in NASA CFITSIO 3.42, specially crafted images parsed via the library can cause a stack-based buffer overflow overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver an FIT image to trigger this vulnerability and potentially gain code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-3849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcfitsio-bin - 3.430-2
libcfitsio9 - 3.430-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cfitsio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.430-2').
